price: Yalanı, ancak Allah’ın âyetlerine iman etmeyenler uydurur. İşte onlar, yalancıların ta kendileridir.
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَفۡتَرِي ٱلۡكَذِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَٰذِبُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: innamā yaftarī al-kadhiba alladhīna lā yu'minūna biāyāti al-lahi wa-ulāika humu al-kādhibūna
